title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 650 - Reports Of Private Institutions And Agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 650 - Reports Of Private Institutions And Agencies

State Regulations
§ 650.1 - [Repealed]
§ 650.2 - [Repealed]
§ 650.3 - Child-caring agencies and institutions (annual financial reports)
§ 650.4 - Hospitals or sanatoria (annual reports)
§ 650.5 - Private homes for the aged
§ 650.6 - Institutions providing temporary or special care (annual statistical reports)
§ 650.7 - Medical convalescent or nursing homes which are incorporated (annual statistical and financial reports)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 650

Statutory authority: Social Welfare Law, §§ 20, 34, 37, 81

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
